entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
